item.title: Bookdown for the scientific notebook
item.description: I’m launching a new scientific notebook using blogdown, following the install instructions at https://bookdown.org/yihui/blogdown/workflow.html and using Yihui’s Xmin theme. I modified some stuff in layouts/ to get syntax highlighting and to show tags and categories. The example posts are still there for now, though I can safely delete them as they can be found elsewhere.
